method.name: create

parameter.name: $path
parameter.description: The folder's parent path, or the folder's path, if the name is omitted.

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The folder's name. You can leave it empty if the folder name is included in the path value. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $mode
parameter.description: The linux file mode for this folder. It is 0777 by default.

parameter.name: $recursive
parameter.description: Allows the creation of nested directories specified in the pathname. It is TRUE by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, False on failure.
